#foreach($collection in $collections) #beforeall

    • #if($collection.Enabled) $core_v2_language.GetResource('Enabled') #else $core_v2_language.GetResource('Disabled') #end

    • #afterall
#end #set($headerTemplate = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('header')) #set($collectionList = "") #foreach($collection in $collections) #each #set($collectionList = "${collectionList} '${collection.Id}'") #between #set($collectionList = "${collectionList} , ") #end
